channel.title: Does anyone notice?
channel.description:
How antisocial players are nowadays? I remember when I would be mining, and everyone in the mine would say "Gratz!" when you leveled up.
Now it's just "lol ur closer to me now noob".

item.title: Does anyone notice?
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“Andrew Ferguson, post:35, topic:388605”][quote author=kingman002 link=topic=484425.msg3550892#msg3550892 date=1301517924]

they are all nu fagz that think they are the shit.

Says the guy who spellz wordz replacing the letter “s” with z" to look cool

RS Economy went to shit, bots became better, therefor having a 99 and/or 30 mil makes you a noob.

I remember when having 10k was rich
[/quote]Haha, when I got my first 100k I was reluctant to buy ANYTHING. This was like 5-6 years ago, though.

I remember I got scammed and lost full iron, I was pissed because I thought iron was the best armor and I had it. (I was 7 at the time)

I remember when charcoal came out and everyone was selling it for like 500k cause they said it was like coal but never ran out. I spent all 3m I had back then on it only to have them turn out to be basically worthless lol.[/quote]…and I thought nobody would ever fall for that scam.

Oops. xD

Read full topic

I think people became jackasses after the graphics update in 08. I guess bad graphics kept people away.

item.dc:creator: @IlikeArrays IlikeArrays
item.description:

[/quote]Ok, we get it. You love RSC.[/quote]

RS is well rs basically the same game with a graphics change. However the players back then were more mature and friendlier.

Read full topic

item.title: Does anyone notice?
item.dc:creator: @classic mopmans little slave
item.description:
@classic wrote:

[quote=“jmood128, post:20, topic:388605”][quote author=Thug-life link=topic=484425.msg3549757#msg3549757 date=1301432917]
Seers bank, Varrock East and West bank - all places people used to hang around selling stuff. There were negotiations on price, the forums were used more for buying and selling regular items meaning you went out of your way to interact with people.

Its convenient, but i speak to very, very few people on RS now. I just get on with what I want to do and speak to the few people I already know on there.
[/quote]

I remember going to trade worlds, it was like a spam fest people would be like “selling stuff 50m” and it was like all bronze shit and other people would be like “Bank Sale” or “Sellin runes 50-500gp!” or “Sellin stuff!”. :P[/quote]

Good times, good times.

Read full topic

@flj0yter0p wrote:

item.title: Does anyone notice?
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

rip4d:

I remember obsidian shields being 200k and capes being 300k. Best days ever, but then that tokkul update happened and killed it. Obsidian capes used to be somewhat of a sign of luck and money, now everyone and their brother has one. Fire capes are the only things that really show some status anymore <<

I lost so much money off of obsidian capes. I remember buying two (which was all of my money) at 580k total. They crashed to about 80k each.

Read full topic

item.title: Does anyone notice?
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

I ended up talking to some kid at Dust Devils once. The conversation somehow ended up like this:

Me: I hope I get a row drop, hopefully I'll have 40M :D Kid: Cool, I have 40M right now. Me: Oh? Kid: Yeah, I used to have 100M, but lost 60M pking Me: Who would PK after losing that much? Kid: Idk I just did. Me: How'd you get the 100m though? You're skills aren't all to good. Kid: Wow u stalker I got it from a clue. Me: Stalker? I was just curious. Kid: Yeah your a stalker Me: So what was the clue reward? Kid: Idk was a few years ago. Me: You'd remember something that monumental in your life. Kid: It was 3rd age Me: 3rd age what? Kid: idk they're all the same Me: No they aren't Kid: *logs* Me: yay free dust devils.

Read full topic
